title: Resolve establishing a Norwood Hospital working group

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Rush, a petition (accompanied by resolve, Senate, No. 1622) of Michael F. Rush that provisions be made to for a working group (including members of the General Court) relative to Norwood Hospital.  Public Health.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Health
Hearing scheduled for 09/29/2025 from 09:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-2
